Pierre's General Store

Family run and friendly

Pierre's general store is a family run business in the heart of Pelican town. Pierre runs the front of the store while his wife Caroline and daughter Abigail help out with stocking and inventory. Come by to pick up supplies or to just have a friendly conversation, if you're lucky Pierre will share some of the stories about his boxing career.

Store Info

Hours of operation:


Monday: 9:00am to 5:00pm
Tuesday: 9:00am to 5:00pm
Wednesday: Closed
Thursday: 9:00am to 5:00pm
Friday: 9:00am to 5:00pm

Supplies

Full stock of various seeds, saplings, fertilizer, and other useful items such as backpacks. We stock year-round goods as well as limited unique stock during each season of the year. We also purchase foraged items, crops, artisan goods, and animal products.

Tomato Seeds
50g
Plant these in the summer. Takes 11 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.
Cauliflower Seeds
80g
Plant these in the spring. Takes 12 days to produce a large cauliflower.
Large Pack
2,000g
Increases inventory so that you may carry more crops, foraged items, and loot.
